• Multiplayer mining game with real-time sync using MQTT.
  • Procedurally generated 1000x2000 tile map with ores, stations, and explosives.
  • Upgrade system for drills, hull, fuel, cargo, and special abilities.
  • Cloud save integration via Puter for cross-device persistence.
  • Mobile-optimized controls with touch D-pad and action buttons.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining adventure where players dig for resources, upgrade equipment, and explore procedurally generated worlds. The game features real-time multiplayer via MQTT, cloud saves through Puter, and both desktop and mobile controls. Players can mine ores, build structures, use explosives, and discover teleporters while managing fuel, hull integrity, and cargo capacity.
